title: Lesson 7: Baptism & the Lord's Table
description: The meaning and beauty of Baptism and the Lord's Supper.

blocks.text: Jesus gave the church two beautiful practices: Baptism (marking our entry into the new life in Christ) and the Lord's Supper (an ongoing remembrance of His sacrifice and our unity).
For as often as you eat this bread and drink the cup, you proclaim the Lord's death until he comes.
